mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This statement lists various items purchased from A. M. Carson for a total of $68.95. It is signed with her mark beside the name Rosa Lewis. It is also signed, with marks, by Isabella Lewis, Mary Lewis, and Susan Lewis. Signatures were attested by A. Patterson.
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Invoice from Gilkeson & McNutt for Rose, April 1860
